text: Anthony David Hawthorn Smith (born 13 March 1967) is an Australian politician. He was the 30th Speaker of the House of Representatives from 10 August 2015 until 23 November 2021. He has been a Liberal Party member of the House of Representatives since 2001. He represents the Division of Casey, Victoria. ==References== ==Other websites== *Personal website * The Hon Tony Smith MP, Official Parliament website biography, retrieved August 2015 Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Australian House of Representatives Category:Politicians from Melbourne
title: Tony Smith
